description: The Hibiscus Smash cocktail is a refreshing twist on the traditional&nbsp;Cosmopolitan. This drink features tequila, hibiscus tea or flower, and simple syrup with a splash of lime for a little acidity.
name: Hibiscus Smash
recipeIngredient: ¼ cup Fresh cilantro leaves with tender stems

recipeInstructions.name: Brew Hibiscus tea and let cool.
recipeInstructions.text: Brew Hibiscus tea and let cool.

recipeInstructions.name: In a cocktail shaker with ice, add tequila, hibiscus tea, agave, lime juice, and fresh cilantro. Shake for 30 seconds.
